name: Examples of federal policies and programs supporting early-stage technology development and innovation
description: Examples of federal policies and programs supporting early-stage technology development and innovation

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: The table summarizes examples of policy and program information collected during the spring and fall of 2017 from federal staff for a selected set of U.S. agencies with major R&D and technology development activities. The table reflects agency responses. For a more comprehensive list of federal policies and programs see Table S8-61.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Science Foundation; SRI International, special tabulations of federal program information (2017). See Table S8-61.Science and Engineering Indicators
